page.title: 07Schools In The Area
page.content: { Netherthorpe.}The school takes up, and uses 25.2 acres. It owns 10 computers and 4 videos. Recently it has had a new gym built. The population of the school is 43 teachers, 659 children and 14 care-taking staff. The boys' uniform is mostly black whilst the girls wear green. { Woodthorpe.} This school takes up about an acre of land. It has 1 computer and 1 video. Its population is 4 teachers,1 caretaker and about 110 children. Woodthorpe is a primary school. { Duckmanton. }This school takes up about 1 acre. It has 1 computer but no videos. The population of the school is 7 teachers,3 caretakers and 160 children.
